description: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed this test Rectifier for technical verification. Its main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.
ranks: When Intro Skill is released, restores HP by 5%. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
